work.p: This poem was first printed in 1897 as part of "Old-Age Echoes."

a machine readabletranscription

notesStmt.note: The final lines on the recto resemble poems from the eary 1880s, "The Pilot in the Mist" and "Thou Mother with Thy Equal Brood," which suggests a similar date for this manuscript.
The verso contains one of Whitman's many trial titles for the volume ultimately entitled Specimen Days.
